metadata.title: CVE-2021-33293 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Panorama Tools libpano13 v2.9.20 was discovered to contain an out-of-boundsread in the function panoParserFindOLine() in parser.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpano13-3 - 2.9.19+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
libpano13-bin - 2.9.19+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpano13 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.19+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1').
